body.name: GTPLAYER Gaming Chair with Footrest Fabric Office Chair with Pocket Spring Cushion and Linkage Armrests, High Back Ergonomic Computer Chair with Lumbar Support Task Chair (Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: 【Reasons for Choosing GTPLAYER】:Experience unrivaled comfort and style with our gaming chair. Featuring a see-through butterfly embroidery design, pocket springs for support, breathable fabric, and highly elastic polyurethane cushioning. Enjoy effortless adjustment with a 10 cm high safety air pressure bar and step-free recliner. Elevate your gaming experience with our exceptional chair.

【Unparalleled Comfort】: Made from a recyclable polyurethane core material, this chair is molded in one piece, ensuring exceptional comfort during extended sitting. With no adhesives used, you can enjoy worry-free seating without concerns about formaldehyde. The independent pocket springs in the seat provide a sofa-like sitting experience.

【Breathable Fabric】: Our self-developed, soft, and breathable fabric, enhanced with quilting technology, increases breathability by two times. You can sit comfortably for long periods without feeling sweaty or humid. Regardless of the season, the chair maintains a pleasant sitting environment.

【Stylish and Versatile】: The chair's simple design and understated color combinations effortlessly blend with any home interior. The delicate fabric complements various home environments, adding a touch of refinement.

【Convenient Interlocking Armrests】: The interlocking armrests prevent elbow strain when adjusting your sitting position. They automatically adjust according to the backrest angle, eliminating the need for complicated adjustments.

【Hassle-Free Purchase】: Along with the chair, you'll receive a detailed instruction manual and all the necessary accessories for easy assembly. We offer a worry-free experience with a 30-day free replacement or refund policy. Additionally, we provide free replacement or repair within one year. If you have any questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact us. We are committed to ensuring our customers' satisfaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this chair, first let's start out with the fact that it came not one but 2 days earlier than expected and everything was neatly placed in the box and all the screws and bolts were in this nice plastic piece. Assembly was fairly easy there were a few steps that were a bit confusing but for the most part was simple to understand. The fabric of this gaming chair is not like other leathery chairs where it's peeling apart within months of being used. The headrest and lumbar pillows are very supportive. I wasn't exactly looking for a footrest within my chair but it's a great added bonus. All and all this chair is really good quality and a really nice chair if your like me and sit at your desk for a long time. Good quality chair for a great price would buy again 👍👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up, not poor quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this chair. Its beautiful looking, super comfortable, and a great price. Couldn't be happier with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, but missing parts
reviews.reviewText: I'm really trying to like this company and it's product but the fact of the matter is that I assembled the chair (which is of great quality) but was not given a left arm rest and I just cannot get consistent enough communication from/with them, despite calling & emailing multiple times.All I need is a left arm rest that should have come with the chair in the first place. Make it happenEdit: I'm getting communication from the manufacturer now. Seems like the delay was due to Chinese new year, I've updated my review to 3 stars accordingly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable with good support
reviews.reviewText: This chair is great. The fabric feels nice, and overall the comfort is a good mix of supportive and soft. It can recline very far back and has a foot rest, it's also quite comfortable in a more upright position. Like this product a lot, I bought two.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable Gaming Chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair for the price is amazing. It was extremely easy to assemble it and the instructions were straight forward and east to understand. It comes with the only tool you need to build it and it's not cheap either. They provide you with an allen wrench that perfectly works for all of the screws provided. Not to mention that everything is labeled perfectly, and all of the small parts (screws, caps, and nuts) were kept inside of this plastic sealed piece of cardboard. So there is no way for any of the small pieces to get lost, it even had extras!For my first time building a chair it was smooth sailing from start to finish. Not even talking about how comfortable and supportive this chair is as well. The upholstery they used is of a good quality as well and doesn't smell funny either like some do. I have no gripes with the chair, but something that somebody might have a gripe with is the lack of support between the head pillow and the lumbar pillow. Of course if you're buying this style of chair then you would know that, but even then there is plenty of room to stick a small pillow in the space between the two of them if need be.Overall highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Meh Quality. (Revised: Horrid quality during 48 hour test)
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to assemble and put together. However, there is little to no support in the actual cushion in the seat. the back rest of the chair is also pretty hard. I had to remove the lumbar support pillow due to it being extremely uncomfortable. The chair dimensions are also incorrect. the seat was more narrow and short than advertised. Part of the reason I picked this chair was it had a larger seat which in turn, was not the case. Another gripe about the seat of the chair was that the foam seemed to have been cut a little short on one side and instead of cutting a new piece, someone said "ehhh, good enough" and closed her up. The recline is nice however im now planning on using it much. This chair does not have a "rock" feature so theres no lean. where you put the chair is where it stays. over all, i feel for 140 bucks, this would be good for a kid or someone who will only use it for a short time each day, but a serious gamer or someone who has to sit in this chair for a long time straight might want to look somewhere else and or buy a more expensive chair. its bad enough that im debating going back to my flaky pleather chair and just save up for a different one.UPDATE: After 48 hours I feel as though I've been in a car accident. My hips are hurting, my back is screaming at me, there's no foam support other than what's at the very front of the seat (which does nothing for you). My rear end feels as though I fell down a flight of stairs. Everyone who gave this chair a 5 star rating must have been paid or somehow seeded cause this chair IS NOT comfortable at all. I'm 5'10" and 250lbs just for reference. You can literally feel the brings through the fabric of the seat like a super cheap mattress that's been used for 20 years. Do yourself a favor and stay away from this particular product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a gaming chair and I went with this one, it is really easy to put together took 10-15 minutes tops. While I was putting it together I did get a defected screw but thankfully it comes with 1 extra piece of every piece so I was able to replace it. I did struggle to put an armrest but after a while I was able to get it in well.I am a 5’5 130lbs female and it does not feel huge it feel like its perfect for my size. Haven’t gotten to try the leg rest other than to just try it out hut it feels comfortable. Overall great chair and I have no regrets at all for buying the chair feels great.
